node.excerpt: May 28, 2020 Dear Graduating Students, UC Santa Barbara Families and Friends, and Members of Our Campus Community, Each year during this time, I so enjoy walking around our campus – like every one of you – appreciating its spectacular beauty in full bloom and watching our graduates pose in cap and gown for photos to capture moments that will last a lifetime. node.excerpt: May 14, 2020 Dear Members of Our Campus Community, It is hard to believe that two months have passed since we made the initial decision to transition to remote instruction for our spring quarter, ramped down our research endeavors, and asked staff and faculty to work and teach from home. By working together, applying our creativity and adaptability, and making sacrifices, we have achieved a number…
